2.title: Cluster CPU Capacity
2.query:
timeseries capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.capacity), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(capacity) desc
| limit 20

3.title: Total CPU Processors
3.query:
timeseries cores = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.cores), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(cores) desc
| limit 20

4.title: Cluster CPU Used
4.query:
timeseries used = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.used), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(used) desc
| limit 20

5.title: Cluster Memory Capacity
5.query:
timeseries capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.mem.capacity), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(capacity) desc
| limit 20

6.title: Cluster Memory Used
6.query:
timeseries used = avg(vmware.cluster.mem.used), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(used) desc
| limit 20

7.title: Cluster Storage Capacity
7.query:
timeseries capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.storage.capacity), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(capacity) desc
| limit 20

8.title: Cluster Storage Used

timeseries used = avg(vmware.cluster.storage.used), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(used) desc
| limit 20

10.title: Disk Provisioned
10.query:
timeseries latest = avg(vmware.datastore.disk.provisioned.latest), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(latest) desc
| limit 20

11.title: Datastore Capacity
11.query:
timeseries capacity = avg(vmware.datastore.capacity), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(capacity) desc
| limit 20

12.title: Datastore Free Space
12.query:
timeseries freeSpace = avg(vmware.datastore.freeSpace), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(freeSpace) desc
| limit 20

13.title: Datastore Uncommitted
13.query:
timeseries uncommitted = avg(vmware.datastore.uncommitted), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(uncommitted) desc
| limit 20

14.title: Average Read Requests (per second)
14.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.numberReadAveraged.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

15.title: Average Write Requests (per second)
15.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.numberWriteAveraged.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

16.title: Read Rate
16.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.read.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

17.title: Throughput Contention
17.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.throughput.contention.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

18.title: Throughput Usage
18.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.throughput.usage.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

19.title: Write Rate
19.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.datastore.datastore.write.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:datastore` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:datastore`)
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| limit 20

21.title: Cluster CPU Free
21.query:
timeseries { capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.capacity), used = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.used) }, by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd free = capacity[] - used[]
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(free) desc
| fieldsRemove used, capacity
| limit 20

22.title: Cluster Memory Free
22.query:
timeseries { capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.mem.capacity), used = avg(vmware.cluster.mem.used) }, by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd free = capacity[] - used[]
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(free) desc
| fieldsRemove used, capacity
| limit 20

23.title: Cluster Storage Free
23.query:
timeseries { capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.storage.capacity), used = avg(vmware.cluster.storage.used) }, by: { `dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }
| fieldsAdd free = capacity[] - used[]
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`)
| sort arrayAvg(free) desc
| fieldsRemove used, capacity
| limit 20
